briefTitle: Sevelamer and Secondary Hyperparathyroidism in Chronic Kidney Disease

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* eGFR \< 60 ml/min
* age at least 18 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* any primary parathyroid disease

outcomeMeasures.title: Fractional Change in [PTH] in CKD After a 4-week Course of Sevelamer Carbonate
outcomeMeasures.description: This outcome measure documented the effect of intestinal phosphate-binding on \[PTH\]. Fractional change was calculated as (\[PTH\]post - \[PTH\]pre)/\[PTH\]pre, where 'pre' and 'post' referred respectively to baseline \[PTH\] (before treatment) and \[PTH\] after four weeks of treatment. Reductions were cited as negative numbers, and increments were cited as positive numbers.
